dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 680 RH: Eliminating Pornography from Agencies Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meadows (for himself and Mr. Jones) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To prohibit accessing pornographic web sites from Federal computers, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Eliminating Pornography from Agencies Act.

section.header: Prohibition on accessing pornographic web sites from Federal computers

subsection.text: Except as provided in subsection (b), not later than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Director of the Office of Management and Budget shall issue guidelines that prohibit the access of a pornographic or other explicit web site from a Federal computer.
The prohibition described in subsection (a) shall not apply to any Federal computer that is used for an investigative purpose that requires accessing a pornographic web site.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
